description: Looking for edible gift inspo? Our silky vegan maple fudge is perfect to wrap up and give to loved ones. Don't forget to save a piece for yourself to enjoy.
keywords: Fudge,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dec 2021,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Vegan Maple Fudge Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 20cm (5cm deep) square cake pan. Line base and sides with baking paper, extending paper 2cm over sides.

Place sugars, milk, oil, syrup and a pinch of salt in a medium saucepan and heat over medium heat, stirring, for 5 minutes or until sugar has dissolved. Bring mixture to the boil, without stirring. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until mixture reaches 115Â°C on a candy thermometer. Remove pan from heat and stand for 5 minutes.
Using an electric mixer, beat sugar mixture and vanilla in a large bowl for 10 minutes or until mixture has cooled and thickened.
Working quickly, pour mixture into cake pan and smooth top. Stand for 3 hours or until set. Cut into 2cm squares.
